resources.string: Copyright © 2023–2025. All rights reserved. Released under the GNU Public License, Version 3.0.
This app is designed to help users quickly look up names for plants in New Zealand.
Visit the official webpage for updates and further information.
Welcome to Plant Lookup. This app needs to download source material before you can use it.
Press below to download any available updates.

This is the last Play Store version.
For future updates, please visit the official website.

I\'ve made the decision to remove everything from Play Store due to privacy and security concerns. To provide a safer and more private experience for everyone, future updates will only be available through the website.
